name: Weng Santos
text: Because, reg mail or personal service lang sa pinas. But the courts and the small firms dont have the messenger personnel to always do personal service. Yep, snail mail ang kalakaran ng korte.

source_obj.text: Because, reg mail or personal service lang sa pinas. But the courts and the small firms dont have the messenger personnel to always do personal service. Yep, snail mail ang kalakaran ng korte.
